Entry.JapaneseText: ミリッツァもかわいそうだよな。
<Blue>王の盾<White>にしか居場所がないなんて、 思い込みもいいとこだぜ？
Entry.EnglishText: Isn't it awful that she thinks the only place that will take her is the <Blue>Royal Shield<White>?

Entry.JapaneseText: そうさ……それに、居場所と言ったって、 トーマはおまえたちをだましてたんだろ？
Entry.EnglishText: It is though... And anyway, when you were talking about where you belong, weren't you guys deceived by Tohma?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……トーマの事は許せない…… 正しいとも思わない。でも……
Entry.EnglishText: I can't forgive Tohma... and I don't think that he was telling the truth. However...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Blue>王の盾<White>は、ハーフの私を認めてくれる…… 唯一の場所だった……
Entry.EnglishText: The <Blue>Royal Shield<White> was the only place that accepted me as a Half...
